Text:
You will need full Acrobat. The program will install a "distiller" which will be shown under your print options. 
Open the Excel file, choose file, print, acrobat distiller. It will bring up a box with which you can name your file and save in pdf format.
Without the full version of acrobat, you can't do this.
Source(s): http://www.nemopdf.com/how_to_use/excel_to_pdf.html
